manipulators.description: Turn capslock into a custom modifier key
Capslock + Tab to switch between an application's windows
Capslock + A to open Activity Monitor
Capslock + E to open files in TextEdit
Capslock + F to open a new Finder window
Capslock + G to toggle Greek input
Capslock + J to toggle Japanese input
Capslock + Escape to quit all programs
Capslock + V to open files in Visual Studio Code

rules.description: Map Control alone to Command + Space
Swap Command and Option with arrow keys
